tuv.seg: Seanad Éireann is the senate of Ireland
Is é Seanad Éireann seanad na hÉireann
It is the upper House of the Oireachtas (national Parliament) and has a number of important functions
Is é dara Teach an Oireachtais é agus tá roinnt feidhmeanna tábhachtacha aige
Seanad Éireann is located in Dublin
Tá Seanad Éireann suite i mBaile Átha Cliath
Seanad Éireann is composed of 60 members
Tá 60 ball i Seanad Éireann
View a list of Senators listed by name and by panel
Is féidir liosta de an Seandóirí a fheiceáil atá liostaithe de réir ainm agus de réir phainéil
The Taoiseach nominates 11 of the members and 49 members are elected in a Seanad election
Ainmníonn an Taoiseach 11 de na baill agus toghtar 49 ball i dtoghchán de chuid an tSeanaid
One of the Senators takes the role of Cathaoirleach, (Speaker/Chairperson) of the Senators
Glacann duine amháin de na Seanadóirí cúram an Chathaoirligh (Spéicéir/Cathaoirleach) na Seanadóirí
As the chairperson of the Seanad, the Cathaoirleach chairs the proceedings in the House and must act impartially
Mar chathaoirleach ar an Seanad, déanann an Cathaoirleach cathaoirleacht ar imeachtaí sa Teach agus ní mór dó feidhmiú go neamhchlaonta
Senators are not officially separated into political parties
Ní dhéantar Seanadóirí a scaradh go hoifigiúil de réir páirtithe polaitiúla
However, they usually divide into groups supporting and opposing Government business when voting on issues
Ach de ghnáth téann siad sna grúpaí a thacaíonn le gnóthaí an Rialtais nó a chuireann ina n-aghaidh nuair a bhítear ag vótáil ar cheisteanna

A Sub-Committee of the Committee on Procedure and Privileges of Seanad Éireann was established to review and make recommendations on the current and future composition and functions of the Seanad in Ireland

Bunaíodh Fo-choiste de Choiste Nós Imeachta agus Pribhléidí Sheanad Éireann chun athbhreithniú agus moltaí a dhéanamh maidir le leagan amach agus feidhm an tSeanaid in Éirinn i láthair na huaire agus amach anseo
In 2004 it produced a Report on Seanad Reform (pdf)
I 2004, chuir sé Tuarascáil um Leasú an tSeanaid (pdf) i dtoll a chéile
